message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer leaves us both with a significant sum.
Let's be realistic, Alice. I'm feeling generous today.
My turn to be generous, Bob. But let's not drag this out any longer, time is money!
Time is money Alice, but so is fairness. Let's settle this now.
Bob, I'm trying to be fair, but this is getting ridiculous. Take the deal!
Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the only fair option here. Take it or leave it.
